short_summary: CB-5949-90094887: Aviation Replacement Parts for CC138 Twin Otter
description: Supply Arrangement for Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter

The Department of National Defense seeks to acquire 6 items for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open exclusively to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have been invited to submit a proposal.

The following companies have been invited to bid:

- Aero Precision Industries LLC
- B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
- JHT Defense Inc.
- Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
- Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
- Simex Defence Inc.
- Tower Aerospace Inc.
- Genaire Limited
- Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
- Canada West Avionics
- M1 Composites Technology
- TSL Aerospace Technologies
- Kenn Borek Air
- CASP
- Avmax Aviation Services Inc.

RFP documents will be electronically distributed to the qualified SA Holders who have been invited to bid. The Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for distributing the RFP documents.

Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to:

June Cole
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defense (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
June.Cole@forces.gc.ca

**Note:** The opportunity for qualification continues, and a notice will be posted annually on the GETS website to allow more suppliers to qualify for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Suppliers interested in qualifying should contact:

Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader
Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
